overview: 'You know you have screwed up in life when you can rate every prison in Canada on a five star basis.' Diagnosed with anti-social personality disorder with psychopathic tendencies, Chris Hoard has spent most of his life behind bars. Now he wants to leave it all behind. 'Move on. Life is a bitch.' He quits drinking and using, and decides to use his business skills as a drug dealer to start a company, totally legal, to do renovations and construction. Soon Chris stumbles from one madcap adventure to the next. This intimate, character driven film chronicles the trials and triumphs Chris is facing in his attempts of making his Native construction company a success.
title: Anti-Social Limited
